title: Thanks for the 0.15 AP ration on Noctune's Passive
body: It was pleasant to heal for 12 more HP every 9 seconds paying 3600 for Rageblade + Herald's buff.

replies.body:
If you think this change means you're supposed to buy rageblade you're silly.

It's mostly just so Barons AP isn't wasted on him.
thats what they said in the patch notes though

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sh93vUw0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-18T21:39:55.240+0000)
>
> thats what they said in the patch notes though

They said it was to make it feel better -if- you bought stuff like Rageblade & Gunblade, + Baron buff and blue buff. They weren't intending the change to alter your build.
lol @ ap on noc.  His fear already scales 1.
doesn't he already have an ap scaling in his kit.
On his E, but you primarily use it for defensive purposes.
Defensive? What? You either go full AP Noc or don't play him at all. At least that's my fun build.

> [{quoted}](name=gank me pls,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sh93vUw0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-18T17:52:20.442+0000)
>
> If you think this change means you're supposed to buy rageblade you're silly.
> 
> It's mostly just so Barons AP isn't wasted on him.

or you wont be THAT screwed if you didnt swap your runes and masteries xD{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

hmm, i never thought of baron buff, i thought rito were trolling, encouraging people to go AP noc, or just build more hybrid items like rageblade and gunblade. still though its pretty situational and anyone half decent at the game knows that baron is the best objective in the game, so much so diving to smite it as a jungler (like nocturne) is worth it 90% of the time, and so the biggest reward for noc comes from that situation specifically more so over getting the baron easily and then healing a tad more from minions/the jungle before diving the enemy base

> [{quoted}](name=gank me pls,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sh93vUw0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-18T17:52:20.442+0000)
>
> If you think this change means you're supposed to buy rageblade you're silly.
> 
> It's mostly just so Barons AP isn't wasted on him.

Well then, that extra 6 hp healed off of that AP ratio+barons is so amazing man. Like, after 20 minutes, I feel like I could heal to full *6 hp at a time.*
Gee yea a buff damnit riot why?
Actually it can affect his power because people change their build when they see the note, changing perceived power.
Well that was the point of the buff.
No, what I'm saying is that people see that and think they should build something that they shouldn't and then that item choice makes them think it's weaker.
What are they going to build, zhonyas? The buff is there so that items like guinsoos that synergize with his kit don't have wasted stats.
At least you can make an use of it, not like Yi Meditate buff, lol.
At least it IS a buff...when's the last time my boy {{champion:91}}  got buffed?

patch 5.22


Base mana increased to 377.2 from 327.2.
{{champion:40}}

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sh93vUw0,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-05-18T21:56:57.321+0000)
>
> {{champion:40}}

The thing is that janna's been overpowered for like four seasons.
She's not so much OP as she is able to peel off very well. She doesn't really carry the game, she is just damned good at making sure her carries do that.
Janna being Janna since she was born. Peels for days.
Janna is by no chance op, she just synergizes well with ADCs that are in meta, when lucian, caitlyn, and twitch are in meta she can make their poke/all in better with shield and peel.
4.9(?) When they buffed Yorick's armor by 4.
just like every other champion
He doesn't need one.

What? I'm not talking about Nocturne. The guy I replied to wants a Talon buff.

>When's the last time my boy {{champion:91}} got buffed?
Yea, its why I prefer discussion view over chronological.
Right above the Leave a Comment box and right below the OP "Switch to Discussion/Chronological View"
Drain tank is nice. If they have more than a few squishies, standard is alright even in higher elos.

> [{quoted}](name=Steel Blossom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sh93vUw0,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-18T21:29:30.218+0000)
>
> At least it IS a buff...when's the last time my boy {{champion:91}}  got buffed?

his E gets AP ratos soon

> [{quoted}](name=PiVoRx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sh93vUw0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-18T21:02:16.372+0000)
>
> At least you can make an use of it, not like Yi Meditate buff, lol.

You dont think Yi benefits from a stronger meditate?
He comes just a liiiiiitle closer to acheiving Nirvana.

AND buying Rageblade makes your E deal 50-74 more damage over the duration. Don't forget that.

But for real, Nocturne does really well with the Guinsoo's passive, and giving him an additional incentive to buy it for those who were gun-shy about getting AP is just good design. You don't have to buy the thing you know :P

You are assuming this was intended to be a massive buff. It wasn't. It was merely a small change to make you feel better about incidential AP from Natural Talent/Baron/possibly Rageblade or Gunblade (although I don't see those being built on Noc)/a potential new item with a low AP component that is otherwise very desirable for Noc.
Why aren't you stacking gunblades on nocturne? The heck?

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2191457358/49815418?tab=overview
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2191070279/49815418?tab=overview
http://favoritememes.com/_nw/43/62967260.jpg
It's too bad TF and Iceborn doesn't have ap anymore.
Wow! people complaining about a weak champion getting buffs.
its about some rule, weak champions get shit, while op ones like zed and kind are untouched for ages

Yeah I really don't know what they were thinking with this.

Who went to college over there?
